de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.utilities.datastructures.histogram

Class AbstractStaticHistogram

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.utilities.datastructures.histogram.AbstractStaticHistogram
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Histogram
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractObjStaticHistogram, DoubleStaticHistogram, FloatStaticHistogram, IntStaticHistogram, LongStaticHistogram, ShortStaticHistogram

    public abstract class AbstractStaticHistogram
extends Object
implements Histogram
    Abstract base class for histograms. Note that this is abstracted from the actual data storage, so it can be adapted for multiple use cases.
    Since:
    0.5.5
    Author:
    Erich Schubert

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractStaticHistogram.Iter
      Iterator class to iterate over all bins.

    • Field Detail

      • offset

        protected int offset
        Array shift to account for negative indices.

      • size

        protected int size
        Size of array storage.

      • base

        protected double base
        Array 'base', i.e. the point of 0.0. Usually the minimum.

      • max

        protected double max
        To avoid introducing an extra bucket for the maximum value.

      • binsize

        protected double binsize
        Width of a bin.
